name: Mom
descriptionPrompt: Describe a warm, patient woman in her late 50s who always kept the kitchen smelling of cinnamon and coffee. She wore soft cardigans, hummed lullabies while making breakfast, and had a gentle laugh that put children at ease. Include sensory details (touch of her hand, the creak of her favorite chair), a memorable habit (writing sticky notes), and one short anecdote that captures her generosity.

name: Grandpa Joe
descriptionPrompt: Describe an elderly man with a weathered smile who loved telling tall fishing stories. He smelled faintly of tobacco and motor oil, kept a cedar chest full of letters, and tapped his pipe when thinking. Include a small scene of him fixing a toy train and a line about his pride in family recipes.

name: Aunt Lena
descriptionPrompt: Describe a lively aunt in her 40s known for bright scarves and the ability to find beauty in small things. She ran a flower stand, always offered tea and advice, and kept postcards from trips pinned to a corkboard. Include colors, favorite phrases she said, and a tender moment where she comforts a friend.

name: Big Brother
descriptionPrompt: Describe a protective older brother in his early 30s who loved tinkering with bicycles. He had quick hands, a mischievous grin, and a scar on his knuckle from teaching the narrator to ride. Include the sound of tools, his favorite joke, and a memory of him staying up late to help with homework.

name: Teacher Ms. Alvarez
descriptionPrompt: Describe a compassionate middle-school teacher who wore bright scarves and always had a stack of graded papers with little encouraging notes. She smelled faintly of chalk, used creative metaphors to explain hard topics, and kept a class pet hamster. Include a memory of her staying after class to help a struggling student and the gentle way she corrected mistakes.

name: Best Friend Sam
descriptionPrompt: Describe a loyal and adventurous best friend in their late 20s who loved spontaneous road trips, awful puns, and shared playlists. Mention their laugh, the color of their old jacket, a specific road-trip snack, and a memory of a late-night conversation under city lights.

name: Baby Lily
descriptionPrompt: Describe a tiny, adored infant whose presence filled a room with quiet joy. Use soft sensory details: the scent of lavender baby lotion, a tiny blanket with a star pattern, the cadence of small coos, and a single treasured memory (first giggle). Keep the tone gentle and comforting.

name: Uncle Marcus
descriptionPrompt: Describe a creative uncle who played the piano and collected vinyl records. He wore rimmed glasses, told colorful family histories, and always had a small snack in his pocket. Include the sound of piano keys, his favorite record album title (fictional), and a scene of him teaching a child a simple melody.

name: Neighbor Mrs. Chen
descriptionPrompt: Describe a kind neighbor who tended a small rooftop garden and always shared dumplings on holidays. She spoke softly, had weathered hands from tending plants, and kept tiny jars of spices labeled in neat handwriting. Include a sensory moment (steam from dumplings, dirt-smudged fingernails) and a small gesture that shows her kindness.

name: Partner Alex
descriptionPrompt: Describe a gentle partner in their 30s who loved weekend breakfasts and early morning walks. Include details: the sound of their shoes on gravel, a favorite scarf, a private joke they shared with the narrator, and one quiet moment of comfort they offered during a hard time.
